Summary: starlike object moving sw slowed down stopped then disappearedII
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Cave Spring
There were no other sightings in Cave Spring on or around April 25th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was up at 5:45 AM looking out my slidding glass door faces sw. Saw a starlike object going moderate speed then slow down, stop and just vanish.Lasted about 1 minute. At first I thought it may be a satellite. Knowing a satellite cant do what it did. I thought maybe I have seen something unknown.
